description.value: Perhaps trained to remove or destroy restraints from slaves and prisoners by the Twilight Talons or Bellflower Network, a vigilante with this talent can choose to make no more noise than people talking when he attempts a sunder combat maneuver check or attempts a Strength check to break an object. He ignores half an objectâ€™s hardness when attempting sunder combat maneuver checks and when attacking nonmagical objects.
